app module

app.ac_get_contenido(browser)[source]

This method returns a report with the results (failures, warning,…) made by AChecker

Parameters

browser (ChromeWebDriver) – The browser

Returns

A JSON with the results of the report

Return type

JSON

app.accessmonitor(url)[source]

This method gets the JSON of the AccessMonitor analysis

Parameters

url (String) – URL of the webpage to be analyzed

Returns

The JSON of the AccessMonitor analysis

Return type

JSON

app.achecker(url)[source]

This method returns a JSON report with the analysis made by AChecker for the URL given by parameter

Parameters

url (String) – URL of the page being analyzed

Returns

A JSON report with the analysis made by AChecker

Return type

JSON

app.am_get_content_of_link(url, browser)[source]

Given an URL, this method returns the code which causes the error and the location of that error in the document.

Parameters

  • url (String) – The URL to be analyzed

  • browser (ChromeWebDriver) – The browser

Returns

Two arrays: One with the codes and another with the locations in the file

Return type

Array of String

app.am_get_estandares_array(divc)[source]

This method returns an array with the standards of the given DIV WebElement

Parameters

divc (WebElement) – DIV WebElement

Returns

An array with the standards of the given DIV

Return type

Array

app.crear_JSON_limpio()[source]

This method returns a clean JSON with W3C format

Returns

A clean JSON with W3C format

Return type

JSON

app.create_JSON()[source]

This method creates a JSON with the result of analyzing the URL given by POST method with the analyzers selected by the user (also sent via POST method)

Returns

A JSON file with all the results in the W3C format

Return type

JSON

app.flecha()[source]

Return type

file

app.fomat_informe(url, informe)[source]

This method returns the report given by parameter formatted to be accepted by the W3C website

Parameters

  • url (String) – URL of the analized website

  • informe (JSON) – The report to be formatted

Returns

The report given by parameter formatted to be accepted by the W3C website

Return type

JSON

app.logo()[source]

This method returns the file of the AC-Check logo

Returns

File of AC-Check logo

Return type

file

app.merge_reports(informe1, informe2)[source]

This method returns a report with both parameter reports fusionated in one

Parameters

  • informe1 (JSON) – A report with the result of an analizer

  • informe2 (JSON) – A report with the result of an analizer

Returns

A report with both parameter reports fusionated in one

Return type

JSON

app.nombres_por_codigos()[source]

This method return a dictionary with the WCAG names for each standard code

Returns

The dictionary with the WCAG names for each standard code

Return type

Dictionary
